Design, research & strategy

Hi, I’m Jim and I work across design, research and strategy. This is to make emerging technologies practical realities, design systems that are liveable for everyone and help culture fit into our lives today and in the future. To find out more about the specifics, you might want to check out the FAQ.

Here are a few examples of what all of this looks like:

IPFS Mobile Design guidelines

Bringing the power, safety and speed of a P2P internet to everyone

IPFS Mobile Browser guidelines

Designing how to use a faster, safer, and more open Web

Siemens Atlas of Digitalisation

Visualising improving the quality of urban living

Bastion

Making reading liveable in today’s world

The whole site is open source and available on Github in the repo here. Mind the license and give credit where it's due.
